header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Food, bills, wrestling, family, alcohol identification, moving house, buying items for the new flat, friends visiting, choosing universities, funny place names, portion distribution, work, examinations, alcohol, ANON's grandmother, family holidays, hitting your funny bone, objects acquired from the family, working out, Casey's broken arm.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, requesting, anecdote telling, telling jokes
